overview: Mexico DF.; 70's. 30 buildings. 904 apartments. 5000 people. 3,000 exiles. Alejandra, 3 years old, Chilean. Pablo, 2 years old, Argentine. Villa Olímpica, your place in the world. Years later, end of the dictatorships in the south. The return of the parents is the exile of the children. The largest exile community in the world becomes a diaspora. Leave everything behind and start over.
title: Villa Olímpica
